headline: Happy Pink Dot SG from the Proudflare team!
keywords: Proudflare, Life @ Cloudflare, Diversity, LGBTQIA+, Employee Resource Groups
description: In the little red dot city of Singapore, we celebrated the tenth year of an annual event called, Pink Dot SG, on 21st July 2018. This annual event started in 2009 and was formed as a group for everyone, straight and gay, who support the belief that everyone deserves the "freedom to love".
